Saturn Designations  Mean density 0.687 g/cm3 0.1246 Earths Surface gravity 10.44 m/s2 1.065 g0 Moment of inertia factor 0.22 Escape velocity 35.5 km/s
What is the density of Saturn in grams per cubic centimeter? Saturn density 0.69 g/cm3
Saturn is also the least dense of all the planets, its mean density being 0.69 g per cubic centimeter, making it the only planet in our Solar System which is less dense than water.
